channel.title: Lol.. IPBAN! omg this is AWESOME***
channel.description: Can [b]Someone[/b] Please Make me a [b]"Ipban"[/b] Command. It Will be [b]Greatly Appreciated.[/b]

item.title: Lol.. IPBAN! omg this is AWESOME***
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Lol, my first atempt at this (by myself) I called to stop the loop that accepts connections if the player had variable “isIpBanned” set to true. Was saved as a token, etc. Then it hit me, I wasn’t in the client.java. =P

Read full topic

item.title: Lol.. IPBAN! omg this is AWESOME***
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

I rmember someone telling me why I needed GUI Developers…haha this is the reason why:

You upload the program made by your GUI developer and click “IP ban”, then you type there name in and if it it incorrect you get a list of people similar to that name lol and all you gotta do is click on theres. Then a pop up come up and say “are you sure you wanna terminate this connection?” and bam, owned. You know the rest.

Read full topic
item.source: Lol.. IPBAN! omg this is AWESOME***

item.title: Lol.. IPBAN! omg this is AWESOME***
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

if(command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yourusernamethatyouuseonyourserver") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Someothernarblikeco-ownerorsomething"))) { String victim = command.substring(6); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim); if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; appendToIPBanned(p.connectedFrom); } System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is IPbanning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully IPbanned"); }

And yeah, the ip ban most server are equipped with don’t work every well, they don’t block the connection all the way…

Read full topic
item.source: Lol.. IPBAN! omg this is AWESOME***
